text: okay it’s uploaded
FTR, the Azure stuff is because we have a privileged set of keys that are used to clone the S3 bucket to Azure, and it’s got a very simplistic ACL set (all public)

elements.text: FTR, the Azure stuff is because we have a privileged set of keys that are used to clone the S3 bucket to Azure, and it’s got a very simplistic ACL set (all public)

text: So don’t rely on ACLs in the `julialang2` and `julialangnightlies` buckets; they’ll be circumvented by the Azure bucket cloning

elements.text: So don’t rely on ACLs in the
buckets; they’ll be circumvented by the Azure bucket cloning
